CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 25, 1957, pg. A14 reads: "Debs Dance - A scene of beauty and youth was that pictured here when the 17 lovely young girls did their special dance, weaving in and out with gaily colored ribbons, during the 1957 AKA Debutante Cotillion. The scene was set in Pittsburgh Room of the Penn-Sheraton Hotel. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Seven groups of men and women, possibly parents of the debutantes, walking as couples through the Pittsburgh Room of the Penn Sheraton Hotel for the Alpha Kappa Alpha 1957 Cotillon, with Bobby Jones Trio bandstand in background
